datasources.name: Logging
datasources.description: To send logs to logz.io you need provide Google Cloud Function name. When you will run snippet please be sure that is you logged in and assign your profile to relevant project.

telemetries.hint: Switch the toggle on if you want send logs to logz.io though Google Cloud Sink and Google Cloud Pubsub

params.name: functionNameRegion
params.label: Function Name Location
params.description: Choose region to where you want to deploy gcloud function.
params.hint: Region need to provide for deploy Google Cloud Function

params.name: projectID
params.label: Primary Project ID
params.description: ID of Google Cloud project from where to send logs to logz.io.
params.hint: Google Cloud function will be create for parse logs in proper format.

params.name: resourceType
params.label: Google Cloud Resources
params.description: Send logs that includes one of the resource types
params.hint: (Optional) Logging Sink filter, filter only by resource type, need to be fill in an array with comma seperator. If that field empty will send all logs
